name: Arwen
description:
"Many years ago, we lived in complete harmony, but, some time ago, it was disrupted by masked men. I Don't know who they are, nor what they want. For all I know is that my family is dead and the entire village lies in ruins. Elderly, children, man and women... All dead... I will seek vengeance against them. I will fight using my bare hands. I will fight using my traps. It doesn't matter how, but I will fight! And if needed, I will die on the field."

-----------------------------------------         O        ---------------------------------------------

Arwen is a singleplayer Platforming Tower Defense Game. This demo is being published so that I can get enough feedback and better polish the gameplay. Feel free to leave your feedback :)

Contact: gaio.gabi@gmail.com

- Gabriela
